visualization_prompt: Generate a radial bar chart showing quarterly performance metrics using synthetic data with a normal distribution (μ=100, σ=50) and polar coordinate styling
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 12 numerical values representing quarterly metrics with synthetic data following N(100,50²) distribution. Values range 50-145 showing intentional bimodal distribution with Q5-Q7 peaks. The radial layout maximizes space efficiency while maintaining proportional comparisons through angular encoding. Chart follows Tufte's principles by eliminating gridlines and using minimal ink for data representation. Color progression from cool to warm hues leverages Cairo's preattentive processing for quick pattern recognition. Animated transitions (3000ms easeOutQuint) enhance perception of data relationships without distracting decoration.
